title: Transmission LXC
textContent:
Transmission LXC 
                Transmission is a
                    free, open-source BitTorrent client known for its fast download speeds and ease of use. It supports
                    various platforms such as Windows, Linux, and macOS and has features like web interface, peer
                    exchange,
                    and encrypted transfers.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Transmission LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/transmission.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                ⚙️ Initial Login
                user/password transmission
                Transmission Interface: IP:9091/transmission
outerHTML:
Transmission LXC

Transmission is a free, open-source BitTorrent client known for its fast download speeds and ease of use. It supports various platforms such as Windows, Linux, and macOS and has features like web interface, peer exchange, and encrypted transfers.

To create a new Proxmox VE Transmission LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/transmission.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

⚙️ Initial Login

user/password transmission

Transmission Interface: IP:9091/transmission
